The value part of Authorization header is constructed as follows:

ol.li: Combine username + ‘:’ (colon character) + password into a single string. Notice that the username field cannot contain a colon.
Encode the string generated in step 1 using Base64.
Prepend "BASIC " to the string encoded in step 2.

body.p: For example, if the value of username is services and the password is magic#123, the string to be encoded using Base64 is services:magic#123. Then, the header to be sent to RemoteTM is:
